section.heading: Nonliability of a third-party contact and Ombudsman.
section.text: A third-party contact, whether a managing agency or other designee, and the Ombudsman shall not have any:

para.text: Responsibility for paying a past-due bill;
Liability regarding a past-due bill or any other charges that may accrue;
Authority to delay or prevent termination of service; or
Authority to make a payment arrangement for the entity.
